sobre.heroSubtitle: Learn about our history, mission, and values
sobre.historyParagraph1: ONGEP was founded in 2010 by a group of educators and social workers concerned about the lack of educational opportunities in underprivileged communities. What began as a small tutoring project in a single community has grown and transformed into an organization with multiple projects and initiatives.
sobre.historyParagraph2: Over the years, we expanded our work to include not only formal education but also cultural, environmental, and community development projects. Our approach has always been based on active community participation and respect for local particularities.
sobre.historyParagraph3: Today, ONGEP is recognized for its excellent work and the positive impact it generates in the communities where it operates, having directly benefited more than 5,000 people through its programs.
sobre.valuesSubtitle: Principles that guide our actions and decisions

values.title: Inclusion
values.description: We believe everyone deserves equal opportunities, regardless of their origin or social status.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We seek quality in everything we do, with commitment and responsibility.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We are always looking for new ideas and approaches to address social challenges.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We work to create lasting solutions that can continue to generate positive impact over time.
